      • checkZip

        public static boolean checkZip(java.lang.String zip)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               net.lingala.zip4j.exception.ZipException
        Checks the zip file to see if its directory structure corresponds to the application's expected structure. For this, it must have a Languages file and all the required files.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        net.lingala.zip4j.exception.ZipException

      • insertObject

        public <T> void insertObject(T obj,
                    java.lang.Class<?> c)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Inserts the object or list of objects into its respective JSON class file. If a list of objects is passed as argument, the method overwrites the file content. The file is also overwritten if the object is a Languages instance. Regardless of the object type, the JSON output will always be a list.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
